bug.author: FrankCreen
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
Always 0.2475 mAP after some train epochs on my own datasets, Try the yolov3.cfg and yolov3-spp.cfg. Does someone have the same trouble???

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/FrankCreen>@FrankCreen</denchmark-link> can you post your results.png file?

@FrankCreen can you post your results.png file?
OK. The res_20200402 represents the results at 2020/04/02. And there're four results from 0402 to 0405. Thank you!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/FrankCreen>@FrankCreen</denchmark-link> looks fine. The dataset may simply be a difficult dataset. Look at your train_batch0.png and test_batch0.png to make sure your labels are correct.
This issue is stale because it has been open 30 days with no activity. Remove Stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days.
